job.title: Robotics Engineer
job.description:
Job Title: Robotics Engineer ( Hardware/ Firmware Engineer )
Salary: $100-120K Entry Level (college -3 years of experience) $120-150K Mid-level (4-6 years of experience) $160K+ for 6-10 years of experience
Location: Onsite San Jose for at least the first few months, this is a very hands-on role but can move to more of a hybrid position after a few months
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We are a venture-backed Silicon Valley startup in San Jose, CA that revolutionizes the way work is done in warehousing, logistics, and supply chain with innovative robotic solutions.
What You Will Be Doing
Candidate will develop and support firmware coding designs that interface to and control analog, power and digital circuit boards, utilizing embedded microprocessor firmware code written on C++. The candidate would also support and develop Python scripts for testing and develop and maintain critical safety-related firmware, developed on specialized Programmable Logic Controllers. The candidate would also be heavily involved in hardware design.
You will be a key member of the Hardware team, responsible for collaborating cross-functionally with electrical, mechanical, firmware, and software teams in order to define and develop the embedded firmware to support existing designs and also to evaluate new technologies and features. You will be a contributor to the transition of hardware designs from concept, through prototype into production. The candidate will also develop and support new firmware and hardware features for current and future products
What You Need for this Position
BS in Electrical, Robotics or Computer Engineering
3-7+ years of hands-on experience
Firmware experience required (C++, C)
Solid understanding of scripting languages like Python
Experience with ECAD software desired: Eagle, Altium, or equivalent
Familiarity with robotics, motion control and/or PID control systems a plus
What's In It for You
Medical, dental, vision, life and AD&D
Flexible time off - work hard & play hard
Awesome company culture and ability to work with robots!
So, if you are a Hardware/ Firmware Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Ashley.Upchurch@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : LU1-1649128 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Ashley Upchurch - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
